author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION STRENGTHENS TO TENTH TROPICAL STORM OF THE 2025 EAST PACIFIC HURRICANE SEASON...
summary: ...DEPRESSION STRENGTHENS TO TENTH TROPICAL STORM OF THE 2025 EAST PACIFIC HURRICANE SEASON... As of 2:00 AM MST Mon Aug 25 the center of Juliette was located near 16.8, -111.8 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Juliette (EP5/EP102025)
